documentation.text:
@dev Change cap of the vault
 @param _cap  allocated reward amount

@dev Set Defi Address
 @param _defiAddr DeFi related address

@dev If the vault has more money than the reward to give, the owner can withdraw the remaining amount.
 @param _amount the amount of withdrawal
@dev  Close the sale that can stake by user

@dev Give the infomation of this vault
 @return paytoken, cap, saleStartBlock, stakeStartBlock, stakeEndBlock, blockTotalReward, saleClosed

@dev Returns Give the TOS balance stored in the vault
 @return the balance of TOS in this vault.

@dev Give Total reward amount of stakeContract(_account)
 @return Total reward amount of stakeContract(_account)

@dev Give all stakeContracts's addresses in this vault
 @return all stakeContracts's addresses

@dev Give the ordered end blocks of stakeContracts in this vault
 @return the ordered end blocks

attributes.text:
@dev Change cap of the vault
 @param _cap  allocated reward amount

@dev Set Defi Address
 @param _defiAddr DeFi related address

@dev If the vault has more money than the reward to give, the owner can withdraw the remaining amount.
 @param _amount the amount of withdrawal
@dev  Close the sale that can stake by user

@dev Give the infomation of this vault
 @return paytoken, cap, saleStartBlock, stakeStartBlock, stakeEndBlock, blockTotalReward, saleClosed

@dev Returns Give the TOS balance stored in the vault
 @return the balance of TOS in this vault.

@dev Give Total reward amount of stakeContract(_account)
 @return Total reward amount of stakeContract(_account)

@dev Give all stakeContracts's addresses in this vault
 @return all stakeContracts's addresses

@dev Give the ordered end blocks of stakeContracts in this vault
 @return the ordered end blocks

params.periodBlocks: the period that give rewards of stakeContract

balanceTOSAvailableAmount().details: Returns Give the TOS balance stored in the vault

returns._0: the balance of TOS in this vault.

canClaim(address,uint256).details: Whether user(to) can receive a reward amount(_amount)

params._amount: the total reward amount of stakeContract

claim(address,uint256).details: claim function.sender is a staking contract.A function that pays the amount(_amount) to _to by the staking contract.A function that _to claim the amount(_amount) from the staking contract and gets the TOS in the vault.

closeSale().details: Close the sale that can stake by user

infos().details: Give the infomation of this vault

returns._0: paytoken, cap, saleStartBlock, stakeStartBlock, stakeEndBlock, blockTotalReward, saleClosed

orderedEndBlocksAll().details: Give the ordered end blocks of stakeContracts in this vault

stakeAddressesAll().details: Give all stakeContracts's addresses in this vault

totalRewardAmount(address).details: Give Total reward amount of stakeContract(_account)

withdrawReward(uint256).details: If the vault has more money than the reward to give, the owner can withdraw the remaining amount.
